remarks: Membership in value of the partial isomorphism B for a lattice ` K ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibelval1st2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibelval1st2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dibelval1st2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibelval1st2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibelval1st2.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibelval1st2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibelval1st2N $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ Y e. ( I ` X ) ) -> ( R ` ( 1st ` Y ) ) .<_ X ) $.
